title: Pediatric high fever with respiratory distress
source: Synthetic case based on Manchester Triage System flowcharts 'Worried parent' and 'Shortness of breath in children'

patient.name: Emma Chen
patient.chief_complaint: High fever for 2 days with worsening cough and difficulty breathing since this morning
patient.onset: Fever started 2 days ago, breathing difficulty worsened this morning
patient.notes: Child is alert and crying but consolable. Mild intercostal retractions noted. No stridor. Drinking small amounts of fluid.
